alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 11:30PM CDT until June 12 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR SOUTHERN MONTGOMERY AND SOUTHEASTERN CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES... At 1130 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Havana to near Hulah to near Elgin, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Coffeyville, Independence, Caney, Sedan, Dearing, Tyro, Peru, Havana, Bolton, Niotaze and Independence Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
